alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:41AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Branch and northern Hillsdale Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 341 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quincy, or near Coldwater, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hillsdale, Jonesville, Quincy, Litchfield, Jerome, Somerset, Moscow, North Adams, Allen, South Butler and Somerset Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
